## lcd.drawPixmap(x, y, name)



Draws a bitmap at (x,y)  

@status current Introduced in 2.0.0


#### Parameters

* `x,y` (positive numbers) starting coordinate

* `name` (string) full path to the bitmap on SD card (i.e. “/BMP/test.bmp”)



#### Return value

none
